about.title: About
about.intro: The goal of OpenEnergize is to provide an open and extendable energy management platform for private houses. All connection to devices are customizable and can be configured.
about.origin: This software was developed as part of a bachelor thesis at the Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts (Switzerland).

about.license.description: OpenEnergize is released under the MIT License.
